channel.title: Packing up client
channel.description:
Ok well, i am done editing client but, I still have all these files.
See when i play other servers... when you open their folders, they dont have the client.java or compiler.
Whenever i try to move all the files to a different folder my client wont load..
Anyone know the problem?

item.title: Packing up client
item.dc:creator: @Deadly-specz Deadly-specz
